title: Ward Skin Selection in Champion Selection
body: I'm not sure how many people this would apply to but I personally own a lot of Ward Skins and i thought it would be much more efficient if players had an option to select their ward skin in champ select rather than have to go to the shop to select it there which can become a pain especially if you want to change each the skin each game... we already have the option to change our champ skin in champ select so why not our ward skin. comment if you would use it or not or if it would be useful or not or just your thoughts. thanks{{item:3340}}

replies.body:
Yes, I'm happy we are on the same page, I made a very similar thread the other day,
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Qyi1uPIt-ward-skins-selection-in-champ-select
and i really hope they notice that people want this feature implemented.
